page.title: 04A JUNIOR SCHOOL HEADTEACHER
page.content: We interviewed the headteacher of our school. Our school has been open for about ten years ,and Mr.Lord the headteacher has been here since then. He said that he thought our school was better off than most,but he could not {buy as much equipment}now as he could {ten years ago. Mr.Lord finds the job demanding and satisfying.(He also is responsible for the cleaning and cooking staff as well as the teachers.)He is responsible for the school accounts and money. Mr.Lord lives in{Desborough}and comes by car to school everyday.He used to live on the estate ,but moved of it when he bought his own house about nine years ago. In his spare time he enjoys playing golf when he can.He is also very keen on photography.
